column1: #DominicCummings #coronavirus #COVID19 #brexit @talkRADIO #BorisJohnson _ I notice they're sitting in the window beside their pretentious sign. Obviously not camera shy. SELFIE!
Thank you to this man. We're in very bad trouble if this govt is using the coronavirus to remove our human and civil rights

#DominicCummings #coronavirus #COVID19 #brexit #GE2019 _ The storm against Dominic Cummings isn't about lockdown/coronavirus, it's about Brexit, GE2019 and getting at Boris Johnson. Cummings is hugely important to Johnson, and Cumming's leaving would weaken him.
